program.name: bluefish
program.script-header:
_datadir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/share" _docdir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/doc"
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-bbigtoc -Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; ia64*-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+b," ;; *-hpux11.[01]*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-irix*) CC=c99 CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1009,1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86*-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -arch ev5 -msym -readonly_strings" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris2.8) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -xarch=v8plusa" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -m32 -xarch=sparcvis" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
program.configure: ${SHELL} ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CXX="${CXX:-g++}" CXXFLAGS="${CXXFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_JPEG_INC} -I${SB_VAR_LIBPNG_INC} \ -I${SB_VAR_LIBZ_INC} ${CPPFLAGS+${CPPFLAGS}}" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_JPEG_LIB} -L${SB_VAR_LIBPNG_LIB} \ -L${SB_VAR_LIBZ_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_JPEG_LIB}:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPNG_LIB}:${SB_VAR_LIBZ_LIB}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBCAIRO_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBENCHANT_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}//pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGDKPIXBUF_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPNG_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBXML_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPCRE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_GUCHARMAP_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBZ_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBZ_LIB}/pkgconfig" \ --with-libintl-prefix=${SB_VAR_GETTEXT} \ --with-libiconv-prefix=${SB_VAR_LIBICONV} \ --disable-dependency-tracking --disable-static \ --disable-update-databases --disable-xml-catalog-update \ --datarootdir=${_datadir} --datadir=${_datadir} --docdir=${_docdir} \ --mandir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/man" \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
